name: Air Craft: Plane Fighters
description:
You like fighting in the air with plane fighters
You like war craft, air craft games
You like combat games, action games, shooting on the air with air plane fighters
You like air plane fighters craft games
Play this game
Amazing you are flying on the air, control plane fighters and shooting ...
air plane fighters action combat shooting game style
This is very basic of air plane fighters shooting game style
There are three fighters planes you can choose to shoot enemies.
Virtual Joystick to control plane fighter position on the air
Fire, rocket buttons to turn fire on
- Choose your fighter form main menu and starting, like a hero against enemies, yeah. you'll be a skies hero.
